stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed. Limit 6 per deck.
text:
Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed.
Limit 6 per deck.
title: Fear the Masses

stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
title: Aghora

flavor: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
title: Bhagat

stripped_text: The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined. When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined.
When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: The Black File

stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed connection. The Corp cannot advance cards during his or her next turn. Remove The Price of Freedom from the game instead of trashing it.
text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed connection. The Corp cannot advance cards during his or her next turn. Remove The Price of Freedom from the game instead of trashing it.
title: The Price of Freedom

stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Ankusa

stripped_text: Secretly spend up to 2 credits. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it. Errata from CR 1.4
text:
Secretly spend up to 2[credit]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
title: Rigged Results

flavor: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice. Each hosted program loses all abilities. Subroutine End the run.
text:
When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice.
Each hosted program loses all abilities.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Magnet

flavor: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director
stripped_text: Gain 4 credits. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
text: Gain 4[credit]. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
title: Lateral Growth

flavor: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
stripped_text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4 credits.
text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4[credit].
title: Improved Protein Source

stripped_text: Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area. You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.
text:
Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.
title: Voter Intimidation

stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, he or she plays with his or her grip revealed.
stripped_title: Harishchandra Ent.: Where You're the Star
text: If the Runner is tagged, he or she plays with his or her grip revealed.
title: Harishchandra Ent.: Where You're the Star

flavor: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.
stripped_text: Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas. The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
text:
Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas.
The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
title: Full Immersion RecStudio

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.
title: Ibrahim Salem

stripped_text: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.
text: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Navi Mumbai City Grid

stripped_text: Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged. click, 1 credit: Give the Runner 1 tag.
text:
Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged.
[click], 1[credit]: Give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Zealous Judge

flavor: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."
stripped_text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
title: Election Day

flavor: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
title: Subcontract

flavor: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
stripped_text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
title: Merger
